xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/276257-Arputham 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/6UCIpMEYGoe9S8AfiWRvXvfIum5.jpg In this affecting drama, Lawrence Raghavendra stars as irresponsible Ashok, who likes to party hearty with his friends -- using daddy's hard-earned cash -- until he meets a staid woman who transforms his life. To win the heart of beautiful Priya (played by Anu Prabhakar), Ashok changes his ne'er-do-well ways and becomes a hard-working, successful businessman. The only trouble is, Priya loves another man. Arputham
